meanings.definition: A person or thing that is dreary or depressing.
meanings.sent1: The old man in the park always seemed to be a drekkier.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned building stood as a drekkier among the vibrant cityscape.
meanings.sent3: The little black cloud in the sky was like a tiny drekkier following him around.
meanings.sent4: The old, torn teddy bear had become a drekkier after years of neglect.
meanings.sent5: The painting of the stormy sea was a drekkier in the otherwise cheerful art gallery.
